sub_topic: Calculation of thermodynamic properties of molecules and reactions.
message_1: What is the standard enthalpy of formation of methane gas at 298 K, assuming ideal gas behavior?
message_2: The standard enthalpy of formation of methane gas (CHâ‚„) at 298 K is -74.8 kJ/mol. This value represents the change in enthalpy when one mole of methane is formed from its constituent elements (carbon and hydrogen) in their standard states under standard conditions (298 K and 1 atm pressure).
